review:
We visited because my daughter was having cold and cough this time .
Though we visit regularly for any pediatrics issue and we are happy with the treatment till now.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Nice doctor. raghav is felling better  now.thanku  so much doctor.i hope you treatment  is always helpful for raghav

Very bad experience. Had to take immediate appointment at 7:30 pm and we got late by 15 mins due to Sarjapur Road jam but he responded very rudely. Doesn’t listen to issues *** ******** ********. Had to take another appointment with other doctor. Advise to avoid taking appointment unless you don’t find anyone in the emergency.

Tellis always talks the extreme case. This happened two times with me so only writing feedback. 

My son got fever because of weather change.  Symptoms were mild fever and cold. But he went in to covid scenarios.

Similar incident was when i took my daughter who was having  wheezing because of cold. He went in to asthma attack.

** **** **** **** *** * **** ** ****** ** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
The doctor is good but was not happy with last consultation as he is walking outside and there was a lot of disturbance. We are paying 750 rs for the consultation and it's not fair **** *** ****** ** ******** ****** * ****** ***** *********** There was too much disturbance due to traffic and half of the time I couldn't hear what he was saying.
********** ** ***** ****** ** **** *******

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Doctor was available late at night when we needed the most. He promptly called at the scheduled time. He gave good explanation of what to do and take care of and what not to worry about. Also the prescription has very few medicines. Thanks a lot!
Very good explanation  of the problem and the best treatment given....  thank you very much doctor....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We consulted doctor at night 10.15 through vedio call. His treatment helped my child, he had 103 fever and all the nearby clinics were closed. Doctor suggested medicines through which his temperature reduced. He was very helpful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** **** ******* Explained everything in detail and well and solved my daughter’s stomach issue. Thanks doctor
